q: Kinect for the Xbox 360 is the way to get 15-year-old girls cursing up a storm on Xbox Live in a new interview with USA Today. Steve Ballmer also says the Xbox 360 "isn't a gaming console," but "a family entertainment center" and "a place to socialize."
